name: Draw It!
description:
Challenge

Draw IT! is precision-demanding VR puzzle game. Help a little ball reach it's destination by drawing way and avoiding obstacles!

Adjust ball speed and compete in leaderboards


Creative Mode

And when you are done with all this levels or just prefer casual experience then immerse yourself in Creative Mode!
A lot more paint is also more ideas. You are limited only by your imagination!

Adjust your drawings by changing colors...


size...


and shape!
